## DFO Puffin Island Helicopter Pad Replacement - Greenspond, Newfoundland and Labrador

### Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Trenton, Ontario, is seeking qualified contractors to replace the helicopter landing pad on Puffin Island, located off the coast of Greenspond, Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4220001511
*   **Tender Closing Date:** October 5th, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EDT)
*   **Closing Website:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17490879](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17490879)
*   **Contractor Requirements:**
    *   The successful bidder will be responsible for furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials to complete the project.
    *   The estimated value of this opportunity is between $100,001 to $500,000.
*   **Bid Security:** A bid security will be required during phase two of the tender process.
*   **Delivery Date:** The project must be completed within 8 weeks after the award of the contract.

### Procurement Details

*   **Trade Agreements:** This tender opportunity is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Agreement on Internal Trade (AIT).
*   **Regions of Opportunity:**
    *   Region of operation: Newfoundland and Labrador
    *   Region of delivery: This contract will be carried out in the province of Newfoundland and Labrador.
*   **Selection Criteria:** The successful bidder will be awarded based on the lowest price.
*   **Languages:** English and French.

### Important Documents

*   [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17490879](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17490879)
